projects.title: DX Expenses

projects.title: Jsox Dashboard
projects.currentPhase: The project will begin by converting the database from XLS to XLSX using both provider and internal sources through the DX Team. The data will then be transformed to extract all required information. A dashboard visualization will be created based on the provided PPT. Pilot tests will be conducted, and the final solution will be delivered to the QDOC Team along with a walkthrough of its functionality.

projects.title: RoBot Innovation Zone
projects.currentPhase: The Nova voice build has been stabilized and made portable, enabling personalized responses and bilingual output (Spanish and English) with a consistent tone. It can be easily deployed and executed on any compatible device. The required components to begin building the first stage of Nova‚Äôs mobility‚Äîspecifically an arm‚Äîare ready; however, progress is pending the arrival of the Arduino, which serves as the core controller of the system.
